name: Luminous Stand-Off
description:
Luminous Stand-Off is a university project developed by Disco Devs. The project is still early in development. Luminous Stand-Off is fast paced twin stick shooter that is currently in testing stage on both PC and Android.

Currently you can only play the online multiplayer game mode. So you have to be connected to the internet and know that someone else is also currently playing the game to verse somebody in a match.

We welcome and appreciate all feedback!
